code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./reducers";import{reactReduxFirebase,getFirebase}from"react-redux-firebase";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import fbConfig from"../config/fbConfig";var configureStore=function configureStore(initialState){var middleware=compose(applyMiddleware(thunk.withExtraArgument({getFirebase:getFirebase})),reactReduxFirebase(fbConfig));return createStore(rootReducer,initialState,composeWithDevTools(middleware));};var store=configureStore({});export default store;
